title: Joel & BMOC Brian
description: Joel is disappointed with Brian, his new overweight college roommate and from day one avoids his company. Little by little Joel begins to compare Ted's, his best friend, superficiality with that of Brian's sensitivity, loneliness and caring love. When Joel experiences renal failure, his “ in crowd” friends evaporate from his life, while BMOC Brian reveals his abiding admiration and loyalty to a friend in need.
author: Deep Diver
